mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (sys_user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, user_info, head_img) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_info = #{info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where sys_user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sys_user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, user_info, head_img from t_sys_user where sys_user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sys_user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, create_time, user_info, head_img from t_sys_user
